title: "forestAge"
author: "Eliot McIntire"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: pdf_document
---


This is a simple agine module that adds a unit to the ageMap with each unit of SpaDES time that has passed.

## Plotting

The module plots 1 plot: a map of forest age, ageMap.

## Saving

There is no default saving. The saving follows the .saveInterval and .save
